description: Create StepCard component with status colors and pulse animation
acceptance_criteria: StepCard displays task_id, phase name, and status badge
Status badge color: gray=pending, yellow=in_progress, green=completed, red=failed, blue=skipped
data-testid attributes: step-card, step-card-{taskId}, task-id, phase-name, status-badge
data-color attribute on status badge with color name
pulse CSS class adds opacity animation (1.0 to 0.7, 1.5s, ease-in-out)
Responsive sizing for different screen widths

implementation_notes.overview: Visual step card with status indication
